name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic arms and legs, it navigates the digital landscape with ease, resembling a soldier ready for action. The retroConsole box gives it a nostalgic charm, reminding users of the good old days of gaming. Its screen displays a digital representation of the famous game Snake, adding a touch of fun to its functionality. Retrotron is a unique combination of old-school aesthetics and modern technology, making it a beloved member of the WebtrES community.
